# CNContactProperty

**Class**

An object that represents a property of a contact.

## Declaration

```swift
class CNContactProperty
```

## Overview

A contact (that is, an instance of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact]) has properties, such as [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/givenName], [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/phoneNumbers], and [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/jobTitle]. Each property is represented by an instance of [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContactProperty], which provides a tuple that can contain three or five values, depending on whether the property is a member of an array of labeled values. For example, the [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNContact/phoneNumbers] property is a member of an array of labeled values, so the `CNContactProperty` tuple contains the contact, key, value, identifier, and label. For the [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNMutableContact/givenName] property, which is not contained in a labeled array, `CNContactProperty` returns a tuple that contains the contact, key, and value. The `CNContactProperty` class is used by [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ContactsUI/CNContactPicker] to return the user’s selected property.

## Getting the Contact Object

- **contact**: The associated contact.

## Getting the Property Information

- **key**: The key of the contact property.
- **value**: The value of the property.
- **label**: The label of the labeled value of the property array.
- **identifier**: The identifier of the labeled value in the array of labeled.

## Handling Exceptions

- **CNContactPropertyNotFetchedExceptionName**: Exception thrown when an accessed property was not fetched.

## Generic Types

- **CNLabeledValue**: An immutable object that combines a contact property value with a label that describes that property.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
